lines.text: If you think being an ordinary person is any easier than being an extraordinary one, you're wrong.

[mid-recital]
Excuse me ladies and gentlemen, I have broken my A string
at least it wasn't my G string.
I'll play the fucking triangle, I just want to make music again!
I've given you everything. Every since we were little, everything you've asked for I've said yes. Jackie listen. Jackie... Jackie... I'm sorry.
